titleStmt.title: A Letter from a dissenter to the divines of the Church of England in order to a union

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Authorship uncertain; has been ascribed to John Gother. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Imprint partially false; probable publisher Henry Hills. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
